na lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gazhan ma lags te/ srid
panyid kyang sgyu ma/ sbyam nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'dis skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma lang gzhan ma lags te/ skya banyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom
ldan 'o das sgrog yang gzhan m lags/ sgyum ya nga gzhan m lags/ sgang gnyid kyang sgyu mo/ sgyum nyid kyang rgashir// bcom ldan 'a dos sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan
ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan m lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyumanyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
gzhan m lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang skya ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha
khol tuphyin pa lang gzhan mo lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa nyidi kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'as brtson/
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan mo lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pe lo tu phyin pa de kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma'ags te/ bsam gtan gyi phal tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
sgyug nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan m lags/ skya ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
la tuphun pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyumanyidakyang shes rab kyi kho'o/ tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mo lags/ sgyu ma lang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong

patid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma skyod kyang nang stong ba nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang
phyi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyaphyi nang stong pa nyid do//
bcom ldan 'das stod pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gazhan lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyum nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong ba nyid do// bcom
ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gazhan la lags/ sgyu ma yang gozhanam lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang chen po stong panyid do// bcom ldan 'adas don
0 ba sto yapa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags// sgyum yang gzhan m lags te/ don dam pa stong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan la lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa de kyang gyon// spyir nyid kyad 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma
byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan mal gas/ rgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang skya ma/ sgyu mched kyang 'dul byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las
'das pa stod pa nyid kyang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan m 'a gas/ sgyu ma dang gzhan ma lags te/ shog ma dang tha mo mad pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang theg
ma dang h+pha ma med pa stong pa nyidi do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba mdang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhun ma lags te// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma//
sgyu ma nyid kyad dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags M/ sgyu ma yagazhanam lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyango sgyu ma/ sgyu
chu/ mnyid kyang dang zhi stong pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyang gzhan makhags/ sgyum yang gzhan galags/ chos wAms cad/
pa/ stong pa nyid gyur skyug sgyu mnyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la gso/ sgyu ma yang gzhan l lags te/ na gi man
nyid stong pa nyid[©]nga rgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'dras mi dmags pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan m lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi nags
pa stong ba nyid kyang sgyu maM/ sbyam nyid kyang ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang ga zhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan m lags te// dngos
po modang stong pa nyid kyang ma/ skya ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo de stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma 'gas/ smyon pa da gzhan ma lags/ bo nyid
stong panyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang do bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ga lags/ sgyu ma yang gashamamalags te/ dngos bo
med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang skyum/ sgyumanyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang
gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nyebaganag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan m lag/
sgyum yang gzhan malags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang yod dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan ' dus rdzu 'phrul gyi kang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/
sgrom yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangapa nyid kyang smyu ma/ spyi mnyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/// bcom ldan 'adas dobang po rnams kyang gzhan salags//
sgyum yang gazhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
logs te stobasanyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobasaM rnams so// bcom ldanu'adas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhonam lags te/
byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyumaM/ sgyum nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhani ma lags/ sgyu ma lang
! gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bdonab rnams
kyang gzhan m lags/ sgyum yang gnam lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang skya ma/ stsamanyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan
ka 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan m lags te/ bsam gtananyid kyang smyu ma/ sgyu mnyidakying bas ma gtan rnams so/ bcom ldan 'dus tshodached
pa rnams kyang gzhan m lags/ sgyum lagazhanas lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu mnyi[©]nga tshad yod pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma sa nga gzhan ma lags ta/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang gazugasard pa'i snyoms ba/
'jug ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar po nyidakyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam
par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mthagyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gazhan ga lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags to/ mthor gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/
than/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smob med pa yang gazhanam lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan malags taM/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtsha nam med pa dang/ smo na pa med pa nyid kyang/
rgyum/ sgyumanyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/
sgyu ma pa gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ smra mnyid kyang mngonobang shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan malags/ sgyu ma
yang gazhan ma lags te/ ting ba'adzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gus kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan m lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan laM
lags te/ gzungs kyi sgonyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mo nyid kyango gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags M/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
ma gsate/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyade sgyum/ sgyu mnyigyad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ bcom ldan s ma 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhanomalags/
sgyum yang gazhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang skya ma/ spyom nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan mal gas/ sgyu ma[}]
yang gazhanam lags te/ soso yang dag par rig pa nyidabyang sgyu ma sgyumanyid kyang so so yang dag par 'ge wo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rjechen po
! langagazhanamalags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rjen ponyid kyang rgyu ma/ sgyumanyid kyang snying rjechen po'o// bcomalda'adasasangs rgyus kyi chos ma'adres pa bcob/
kyang gzhan ma lags/ skyo ma yang gzhan m lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dus pa nyid kyang sgra ma spyamanyid kyadasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan
'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gazhanam lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan m lags te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'khrasaM bu yang gazhanam lags/ sgyu ma yod gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang skya ma/
we sgyumanyid kyapalan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong bas bu yang gzhun ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan malags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ bcom ldan 'das dgrubcom banyidakyang gzhan ma lagros/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dog
tha/bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'adas rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma 'gas// rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu
ma/ skyam nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gazhanam lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan maM lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
sgyu mnyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'adas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gnan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa sbrumaMs can
khyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de jisnyam du sems/ sgyum la skya ba'am
'gag pa yod dam/ gisol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas de nim mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ sgyum la kun nA
nyon mongs ba'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab khyor do dzi snyomadu
sams/ gang la skya ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ma/ rnam pa thams cad
bya// mkhyen pa nyid du byung bar gyura'am/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung bo lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang/ brda dang/ gdags pa
dang/ tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de jisnyam du sams/ 'dushes dang/ brda
dang gdags pa dang/ tha snyad tsam gyis nya bar len pa'i dang po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mo 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor do snyam du sams/ gapal 'du shes med cing brda med ba dang/ gdags pa
med pa dang/ tha snyad med pa dang/ ming med pa dang/ ming du gdags pazhed pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ lus kyi las mad pa dang/ ngag mad pa dang/ ngag gi las med pa
dang Da yid med pa dang/ yid kyi las med pa dang/ skya ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mad pa dang/ rnam par byang ba mad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tun
dpa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar rtagyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid thob par 'gyur ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur
ro/[”]bcom ldan ' sa kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don
bdag gis 'tshal to/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na mdab yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tubaslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhi na/ bcom ldaka' sa de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi bsha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha zol tuphyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du chung bar 'gyur
diram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das re na mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i sladang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhinato/ dngos po
mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de/
dag shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gso 'a pa bcom ldan 'das de na la 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das de na 'di ltar rmi lam na dngos bo ma mchis pa 'a reng bzhin te/ dngos de ma mchis dra rtsarang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la
pa pa 'byor de ji snyam du sams/ sgyum lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi 'ol tu phyin pa la nga sangasanang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba ba 'gyur ma/
gso' pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das da ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
pan demigs pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha'abyor da jisnyam du sams/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la bslabs
shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar gyur na/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ngacom ldan 'a das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyanani
na/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhinate/ das po ma mchis da girang bzhin de ni degs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 'kha pa/ rab 'byor do ji snyam du sags/ mig/
'o lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes yakyi pha rol tuphyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid du 'byung bar gyur sa/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das don gyur ro//
da 'a sa da duzhi na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos re ma mchis pa'i rang bzhun de dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan pas
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
'gyur ka/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ni mi 'gyur ro// daci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhade te/ dngos bo ma mchis pa'i
rang bzhin de'i dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung bo lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha la tuphyin pa la/
bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'adas de ga'i di ltar smig rgyu
[5 3]@#/// na des po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ das po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su mamachis so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ rab
la khyor nga ji snyam du sems/ sngal ba lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi rol tu rgyan pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid dul byung bar 'gyur ma/ gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das de nimo 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po la mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni
dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ni 'od ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba na rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi
lam lta bu/ 'du byed nirmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de na debang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag nang stong pa nyid kyang/
mi dmagres so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i ma dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi ma dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmagos so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi
ramigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyispyir mi dmagrwa go/ mtha' las 'das/

ba stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi la de mig sa so// der ba med pa stong panyid kyi phyi ba mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi demig so//
chog thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi dmigs so// rang gi mtshanyid stongang nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
kyi phyi mi dmigs so// ngobo 1de stong pa nyid kyaphyir na dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi ma dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs nisgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma
lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lha khu/ 'du byang r skyem lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu snya/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag nanadaM
stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyistongo pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dgigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so// chen po stong pa
nyid kyi phyi ba mi dmigs so// den dam ngas stong nga nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi ramags so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigasaso// ngor bamed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
phyir ma dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ni dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra bar n lta bu tshor ban sgra brnyanalta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ rnam pa shes ba ni sgyu bar n lta bu ste/ rnam par
zhes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rda dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
phyi la dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa//
nyid kyi phyi ma dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong nyid kyi phyire ma dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stongapanyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// thog ma dang bram mad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
mi dmigs so// der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyiri mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmags so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan
stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phying mi dmigs so// ngob nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi ngomigs so//
sa po yod pa'i 'od stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'abyor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tsho ba namig yo2lta bu/ 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yobaltakhu/ rnam/
pa shes pa ni mig yor lta burgyu/ rnam pa cashes pa gang yin pa'i debang po drug go/ da na phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong panyid kyi phyir mi mgas so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs/
Ta phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyirami dmigs go/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyidakyi phyi ma dmigs so// chan ro stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// don ma pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig
so/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'jug ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs stod/ mtha' las 'a das pa stong pa nyid gyi phye ma dmigs so// thog ma dang tha mched
pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dag gis so/ 'ang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs go/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so
gang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ mi dmigs pa stongapa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// das po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// ngogonyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig
so 2dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba/ zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed/

ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa nimu blo lta bu sta/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga// de dag ni nang stongapa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so/ phyi stong pa nyid
kyi phyir ma demigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa
nyid kyi phyi'i dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi dmagasaso// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong nyid kyi sbyor mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong nga nyid
kyi phyir sa demigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i ma dmigs so// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma demigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi ma dam gas so// rab 'byor gzugasan smigargyu lta bu/ tshorab ni smogo rgyu lta bu/ 'du sha sa ni
smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes ba ni ga rgya lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de nidabang po drug go deni dung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi 'i
mi dmigs so// phyi stong ba nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// phyin stong pa nyid kyi phyi ma dmigs so// stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi ratshigs so// chen bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi mig
go don dam ba stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stongang nyid kyi phyi'i ma dmigs so/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi blo'i mi dmigs so// don med pa stong bskyid kyi phyirami dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi re ba dmigs so/
chos thams cad stong panyade kyi phyi na ramigs go// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// ngas pa med pa stong pa
nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs go/ ngobade stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ dngos bo mad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'abyor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba
ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes ni sprul ba lta bu/ 'du byed n sprul pa lta bu/ rnam pa lorashes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de 'debang po drug go/ de ni phung
byabya/ kho lnga'o// de dag nang stong pa nyid kyi phye ma dmigs go/ phyistong pa nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// stong pa nyin
stong ba nyid kyi phyi'i mi dmigs go// cha bo stong pa nyid kyi 'i mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong ba nyid kyi phyir na dmigs so//
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid kyi rami dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi khyim dmigs so// dor ba
ts+tsha mo da pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir cha dmago sa so/ rang bzhin stong nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyi phyir ma dmigs sog/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyi
phyirami dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi rigs so//
dngos po med pa'i ngo bonyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog
pa 'a gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thosan/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang/ skugapar mi 'gyur lags grang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang nub/
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang m mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu
mang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigasang zhing sdang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang/ 'a sams dpa' chen ngos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jig
mi sdang mi skag pa'iri shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gablugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor bami rtag ces
ba bar rtog sku/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byad mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ma rtag
sa bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// ba 'byor gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
bar rtog ste/ rim dmigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog/ de mi dmigs so//
'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de'i dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de la dmigs so// 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dang bsams/
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi kha col tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdagamad ces bya bar rtog sta/ de ma dmigs so// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ dem demigs so// 'du byed bdagamed ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ dam
dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadad ldan pa'isams kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtogasta/ de mi dmigs so/tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar
shadartog lta/ mid gag so/ 'a sheng zhe zhes bya bar rtog ste/ dkidamigs so// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar rtog/ de mi dmigs so// rnam bzhes pa zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de
mi dmigs so// ma 'byor 'ditaM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhasa'o ba'abyogazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sel
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba l spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'isams kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ desidamag sa go// rnam pa thams can
mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yems kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams kyis 'du shes stob zhes bya bar rtog ste/
dam dmigasago// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan nga'i sems kyis 'dubyed stong zhes bya bar rtogasta/ de mi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams kyis rnam par
zhes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ dmi dmigs so/ yal 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'bya'o
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod patshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'isoms kyis gzugs mtshan ma med cesabya
byabya/ dachamartog sgyu/ de mi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sogs kyis tshor ba mtshan ma mad ces bya ba rtog ste/ de mi dgos so// rnag pa thams
! charamkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'dazhes mtshan ma medaces bya bar rtog sta/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pasamasakyis 'du byed mtshan ma med
cas bya bar rtog ste/ domi dmigs so// rnam pazams cad mkhyen banyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'an po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phra
ba tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smonapa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ mi dmigs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs/
de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sams kyis 'du khyod smon pa med ces bya bar rtogaste/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
sems kyis rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmigs so// kha 'byor 'di ni byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha phol khuphyon pa la spyod pa'i thab
mkhas pa'o 'ab 'byor gzhan ya nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyisagazug
mngon par ba du bya ba yod ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga 'i sems kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med sa bya bar rtog ste/ de mi
dmags so// rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i sems kyis 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog sta/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa//
nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs/ de mi ramags so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam pa shes pa mngon
ba 'du bya ba mad ces bya bar rtog ste/ dem dmags so// rab 'byor 'di nibyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga 'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
ra 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sa mas kyis gzug
dbekazhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i soms kyis tshor ba dbazhes bya bar rtog ste/ de ma dmig
so rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad daldan pa'i soms kyis 'dushes dben zhes bya bar rtog sta/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyadi dang ldan pa'i
sams kyis 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa sogs kyis rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/
du ma dmigs so// rab 'byor 'a'i byang chub kums dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
sams dba' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyidad ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs
par byed de/ mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'idel bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed d/ dam dmigs so// rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba 'dushas mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de midamigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi
[4]yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ dam dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dpaldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs
par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dinabyangs sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
chub sems dang 'a sems dba'ache na po shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par
byad de/ de med migs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de tsho dmigs so// rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
bas 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de da dmi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmashes so// rab 'byor 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pago/ rab 'byor
grubya// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyis yol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
thabs gzugs bag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ domi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bag mdu pa'i rnam par
rtogs par byed de/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ domi dmig
so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yi de la bya bas rnam par shes pa bdag mad pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha col tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lade la bya bas gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byade/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chor ba
zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigasaso// rnamab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs pa red de de ma dmigs so//
rnam pa gas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bag 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs pa byed de/ mi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid dang ldan pa nga yi 'khyabs
rnam par shes bzhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed// dom dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' soms dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rtsol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha khol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang k+Sha nang pa'i/
yid la bya bas gzugs stod pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya bas tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par
byad de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i de la bya bas 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i de la bya bas 'du khyad stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byakhas rnam par shes pa
stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'abyor 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi le 'ol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
thubos mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' wams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu med pa la spyodang 'a/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la byabs gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ dmi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
bar rtogs par byed de/ de ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma mdu pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de ma dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid dang ldan
nga yi de la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan mamod pa'i ma bar rtogs par byed de/ dam dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang nubasams dnga' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// 'ga'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga'i/ rnam pa thams na
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yo de la bya bas gzugs smonapa med pa'i rnam partogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid labya bas tshor/
ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ldan pa'i lo la bya bas 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs pa
byed de/ ma dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med pa rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de ni dmigasaso// rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas rnam pa shes pa sgo na pa med ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen ponga shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi de la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du byas med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de// da mi dmigs so// rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba mang pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de bdamigs// da rnam pa thams cad mkhyan panyid pang
lhan pa'i lo de la bya bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa rnam par rtogs pamadung de gi dmigs go/ rnam pa thams cam@#nyid dang ldan pa'i lo de la bya bas rnam par
shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa rnam par rtogs btsud de/ de mi dmigasaso/ rab 'byor 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa'i thobs mkhas pa'o/ rab 'abyor gzhan yang bya ma sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'a spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dbanapa'i rnam par rtogs par byed// domi dmiga'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lo de la bya bas tshor ba
dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ do mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyari dang ldan pa'i yi de 'a bya bas 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
dmi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdel bya bas 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ dam dmigs so// rnam pa thams
cad man pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa shes pa/ dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ dmi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'
naro shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa la dpa' thabs mkhas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod phrag brgyapa bam bon gnyis pa/
rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ soms can thams cad la gzugs mi dag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar di mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs bdag medaces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos bstanato// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma ngamigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs smonapa med ces bya bar de ma ngamigs ba'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs gzho
bar 'dubya ba med ces bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar da ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mi rtag
ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// ra ba bdagamad ces//
bya ba'i de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba zhes bya bar da ma demigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
to tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma dmigs nga'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa tshul gyis chos bstanato// tshor
ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dbanazhes bya ba'i de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mi rtag
ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa smAtshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes bdag med ces
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstanato// 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de ma dmigs ba'i
tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'dushes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes na ngon du 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ 'dushes dbon zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshulakyis
chos bstan to// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed smyug bsngal zhes bya bar da dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du
byad bdag mad casu bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byung zhi'is bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed so zhes bya bar do mi dmig
ba'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mtshan man da tsas bya bar do mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'dubyed smon pa mdaces bya bar de mo dam gas nga 'i tshul gyis
chos bstan to// 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed dben zhis bya bar du mi dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos
bstan to// rnam pa 'ashes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i rjel gyis chos bstan
do// rnam pa ra shes pa bdag med ces bya ba'i de mi dmagis pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba de me dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba mad ces bya bar mi mi/sa pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
rnam par shes pa dbon zhes bya ba'ade mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan so snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
da lta/ de yod pas byang chub sems dang las mas nan ngo de mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se mas
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi kha khol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus kyi yide la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs ga mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa da mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dngasas rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dngami ldan pas/ gajugs gangasdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangasas
kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugasagang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya nga
dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gangamtshan ma chad pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ma dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
pas/ gzugs gangastso napa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yi de la bya ba dang mi ldan pas//
gzugs ganga mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa'i rnam par de la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs
ga nga dben pa'i rnam par ya de la byed pa de'i dmigs pa'i tshul gyis la de la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ tshor ba gang ma rtag pa'i
rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis yid labyed do// nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas kyi yod la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par/
bya/ yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rangasas rgyas kyi lade la bya ba dngami ldan pas/ tshor ba gang bdag med pa'i rnam
pa yid la byed pa de gi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yode la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid ' byad ba mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshe ba gang stong pa'i rnam par ming la khyad pa de mi dmigs nga 'i
tshul gyis yid la byad do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis de la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
rgyas yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ tshor ba gong snyo na pamed pa'i rnam par bde la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
la byed do/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa yid la byed pa ngam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
ba byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gangadaben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa dang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
dalasangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'dushes gang mi rtag pa rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'dushes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par ya de ba byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mde'akhyad do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yide la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'du shes gang stong pa'i
rnam pa yid la byed pa dam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis de la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan ma mad pa'i rnam
paratshade la byed pa de mi dmigros pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'dushes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par ya de la byed
ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas kyi yode la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yade la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa 'i rnam par yi da la/
byadapa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la bya ba dang mi ldan pa sa/ 'du da gangam rteg pa'i rnam nga ra yid la byed pa po mi
dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis lodal byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigu
pa'i tshul gyis yi de la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yo de la bya ba dang ma ldan pas// 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis
yid la byed ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lade la bya ba dmaldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam pa yid la byed pa de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'du byadagang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas yo de la byed do// nyan thos dngarang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mdel khyadaro/ nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas kyi yade la bya ba dngas ldan pas/ 'du byed
ganga mngon par 'du bya bamed pa'i rnam par de la byed pa dmi dmages pa'i tshul gyis yi del khyad do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ 'du khyod gang dbon
ba'i rnam par yade la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yi de la bya ba dang mi ldan pas// rnamapar shes pa gang 'a rtag pa'i rnam par yid
la byed pa'i dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byad do// nyan thos rang rang sangs rgyas kyi ba de la bya ba dang ma ldan ngs/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa de la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yide la khyad pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lade la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yo de la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stongapa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
thug// rgyas kyi yade la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshamachod pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
tha dang yangs sa rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gangasmon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang bsangs
rgyus yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis pa de la byad do// nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
bas/ rna mkhangashes pa gang dngan pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ ba 'byor 'di ni byang chub sam/sa dnga' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims
kyi ba lo tu phyin panyams pa med pa ste/ de yod da/sa byang chub/mas dpa' phems dpa' chen po domi 'gas mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// la 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/
zhiba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam pa'i rtog
ra byed pa dang/ bzod pa dang sosaba'adi'i byinub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzodapa'i 'khol tu phyin pasku/ de yodapas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de mi
'jigs mi snga nga skrag pa'i m 'gyur ro// ba'abyoragazhan du bung ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rogs lab kyi pha thor zhu phyin pa la spyod pa no/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
panyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab rtog go/ rnam pa grags cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i 'de la bya bas gzugs
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab t+tartog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yodre la bya bas/ gzugs bdag mdas bya bar de mi dmig
pa'i tshul gyis rab rtog go/ rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugasazhi zhes bya b.red mi demigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen banyid dang ldan pa'i yadi la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang rta rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidul bya bas/
gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ gzugs smonab mod ces bya bar de mi/
ramigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyidodang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi mi
ba'i tshul gyis rab t+tartog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dban zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rapa tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar d mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'bartog go/ rnam bo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bas/
tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar da ma dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yod pa bya ba// tshor ba zhi zhes grubar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog gro/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba skyong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ tshor ba
mtshan ma med ces bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor bsnyon pa mad ces bya bar dam demigs pa'i
tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon pa 'du byab yodaces khyabar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
bas/ 'du shes mi rtag cag bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtogago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes byabar de mi
dmigs pa'i tshulagyis rab rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'dushes bdag med ces bya bar d ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes ni zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
mi de la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dgags pa'i tshul gyisarab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'dushes mtshan ma med
ces bya bar dgi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpaldan pa'i 'dem bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
rtogago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
rtog go rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i lo de la bya bas/ 'dushes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yidil bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ du
byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yi de la bya bas/ 'du byud bgamadaces bya bar de
ma dmogs pa'i tshul gyis rab rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tsartog go
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yida' bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid
la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma mad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga 'a yode la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa mad
ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa skams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byada mngon par 'du bya ba mad ces bya bar de mi dmigs/
pa'i tshulagyis rab turtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya khos/ 'du byed daben zhes bya bar domi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs nga'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yade la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lo de la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
bar de ma remathogs pa'i tshul gyis rab rtogago/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa zhes pa [”]stong zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar du tu rtog ste/ gzugs
kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyapagazugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor banyid
kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes ]
go 2'du byed kyi stong pa nyidakyis 'du byed stong patshayigyi 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ rnam par shes rigs stong pa nyid kyis rnam pa
shes pa stong pam yin gyi/ rnam bar gs khanyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong panyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mag gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yazhigyi/ miganyid
kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rnaba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnanyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa
nyid kyis sna stongapa ma yin gyi/ snanyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snya'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi lcanyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'as stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin
gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong panyid kyang yade do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
stongapa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong ba nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/
drinyidakyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'i// ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lo stong pa ma ya na gyi/ 'o nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang g
reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stod pa ma yanegyi/ reganyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong nga ma yagyi/ chos nyid kyang stong
pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mag gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa
tid do/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam dbangashas pa'o// rnamare rnam nga langshegs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
stongang nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma'i rnam pa shes pa'o// lta'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lci rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rtsi'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par ngashes pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong nyare b.lus kyi rnam bshus pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bde kyi rnam par shes pa stong ba ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam
par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong ba nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong panyid kyis mig gi 'dus te'og pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ migagri
'as reg banyid kyang stod pad do/ stod nganyid kyang mig gi 'dus tar ga nga// rna ba'i 'dus lag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te lag pa stong pa malanagyi/
rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stod panyid kyis sna'i dus tag pa stong pa ga yin gyi/ sna'i
'dus tacig pa nyidakyad stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i steng pa nyid kyis lcagi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rtse'i 'dus
tag banyid kyastong pa nyin// stong panyid kyang lce'adus ta'eg pa 'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'ag
lag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyidado/ stong ba nyid kya lus kyi 'as te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid
kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus teg pa'o// mig gi ra dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i steng pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus da reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor/
ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig ga 'dus te reg nga 'i skyon gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

gyis tshor ba stod pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong panyid do// stong pa nyid kyang n ba'i
te reg nga 'i skyon gyis tshor ba'o/ sna'i 'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'i dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i// lcaga' dus da reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rtse'i 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen gyis tshor ba song pa ma yin gyi/ lce' 'dus tareg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lcer 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus

tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ba ma yin gyi/ lus kyi gdus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa/
0 nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skyin gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/
tshod kyi 'dus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong panyid kyang de nga redus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong
pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'a khams nyid kyang stong
nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mo'akhoms kyi stong ba nyid kyis ma'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma' khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong ba nyid kyama'i
khams so/ sgrung ga khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams
kyi stong ba nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stod pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams go// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
stong nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stongapa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ ya'ag pa'i stong pa
nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong ba ma yin
rgya 'du byed nyidakyang stod panyid po// stong ba nyid kyang 'du byed de/ rnam par shes pa 'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/
stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dgazugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong nganyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ming dang
gzugs so// skya mchad drug gi stong pa nyid kyis sku mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skya mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ ga pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa dekyis chog ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa

nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srid nga 'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srung nganyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma

min gyi/ len panyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid nga 'i stong pa nyidakyis srid pa stong pa yin gyi/ sridapa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//

wa/ skya ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skyo ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye banyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skya'o// rga shi'i steng pa nyid kyis sgasha stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa/
nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang sha'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa'i stong nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha lol tu phyin pa nyidakyang stong pa nyid do//

stong ba nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha khol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stongang nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stod pa ma yin gyi//
bzod pa'i pha col tu na panyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsdadang ri pa rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha
phob tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin rgya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa nyid kyastong pa nyido// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha la tu phyin pa'i
stong ba nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tuphyin pa stong pa ma yin rgya/ bsam gtagyi pha grol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes
rab kyi lo tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ gsheb rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sheg

ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong ba nyid kyi stongang nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ zhang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa

nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyade kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyin ng stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yigyi/ phyi nang

stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong nyid kyang phyi nang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ba nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/

stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin rgyu/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//

don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stongapa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong

panyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stod pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyisaM

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis
mtha' las 'das ba stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyo/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong panyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//

dor ba med pa stong ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor bu med pa stong ba nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa 'di do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de// 'ang bar stong

pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stongang nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa

nyidakyis chos thams cad stong pa nyibastod pa g.yon gyi/ chos thams cad skyongang nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi

stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong
nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong ba nyid do// dngos kho/

gad pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis das bo med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// po'anyid stong

pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngom chu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi

stong pa nyidakyis dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo de stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nga stong ba nyid do/
dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran nga bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa gzhag pa nyid kyang stong nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so//

glu gang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yang dag pa spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ rdzu 'phrul/

gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma lan gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyin ngang nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong ba nyid kyi

0/dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbangapo rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stod pa/

nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'gas nga 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyapa'i phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yan gyi/ 'phags pa'i
bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang
stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang
tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang kazugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stod pa nyid kyis rnam par thar ba
rnams stong pa ma 'gyi/ rnam par tharang nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nying kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa sri snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyidakyis
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma mar

ba dang/ smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnag pa'i tharang 'i sgo stongapa nyid dang// mtshan ma mad pa dang/ smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo
zla stong pa nying dang/ nam mad pa dang/ smon pa med pa'o// mngon pa shes pa'i stongang nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
do/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis ling nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong
nyid kyang ting ba'adzina rnams so// gzus kyi sgo'i steng pa nyid kyis gzus kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzus kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzus kyi sgo rnams
song de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs nga 'i stong pa nyid kyis ma 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong ba nyidakyang mi 'jigs/
pa rnams so// sa so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong banyid do/ stong pa nyid/

kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rjechen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rjechen po nyid kyang stong pa de do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rdzatshan/
nge'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor 'denaMbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ ba 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dbal chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i thabs mkhas pa 'o// thabs mkhas pa re dang ldan nga'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nibastan pa
di thos nas ma 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/// shes rab kyipha rol tuphyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po na['] gsum// rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen posanga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi
'jigs mi sdang skrag pa mi 'gyur ba'i ngag pa'i bshesaganyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dba'asams dang skyen po'i dag pa'i
bshes gnyenani/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'ongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la tshor ba mi rtag cesabya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nya' shos kyi sa'am rang sas rgyas kyi par yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dushes mi rtagaces bya bar de mi mig/
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thanas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang
la 'du byed mi rtag ces byakharade mi dmigs ra ri tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'amarang sangs rgyas

nyan thos kyis 'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sder mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la sna'i 'os te reg pa zhi zhes byabar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang ma

ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo sa gu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus tarin

su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog

par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang ngosangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la a kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshamamad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamA
cad kyang rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid mgatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasas rgyas kyi sar yos su srol mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pamtshan ma mdas bya bar dgi dmigA
ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan klos kyi sa'am rasangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sngo rami 'jug pa'o//
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po'i dag ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de lamag gi 'as tareg ba smon pa medaces bya ba de mi dmigasanga'i lagyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
