gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
lama'adrasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spor mi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba mad ces bya bar de ma remagasang 'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag nga'i rtsa ba thams
cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gangad la stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba'ang mi dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis rang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spo ru ma 'jug pa 'o//
gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis sa
'angasas rgyas kyi sar 'ongs su sngor mi 'jug nga ro// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag sa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug/
bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyis
yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdagamed rtses bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
panyid ma gtogs pa'i/ nyanathos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar re ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de byang chub kyi yan
we lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sa sa/
rgyas kyisar yos su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub gyi yan lag rnams mtshon ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang nam
bkrams cad mkhyen nyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi ngamig
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/ nyanathos kyis ma rang sangs rgyas kyis yo sasu skor kajug pa'o//
gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar dmi demags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgu ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gto
bar/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasas sdo'am 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang nub kyi yom lag rnams dbanazhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 1na smosakyi ga'am rang sangs rgyas kyi gar yongs su sngon mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanaglos kyi sa lam rang sas
rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam po/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pasdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangs su rgyas/
kyi sar longs su sngon ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya
bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgo pa'i skyes pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos
su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thamasacad
mkhyenang nyid ma gtogs pa'/ nyan thos kyi sa'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug nga 'o// gang do' 'phags pa'i lam na lag brgyad pa mtshan ma mang ces bya bar de ni dmig
nga'i tshul gyisachos ston cing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dam gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi sa la rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su skorami'adren pa 'o// gang de la
'thags pa'i 'o ma yanalag brgyud pa smon pa mdarus bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenaparnyed ma gtogs pang/ nyan
thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon pa la du bya ba mdas bya bar domi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
ston cing/ dge ba'i rtseb than/sa chudakyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mgatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa 'o// gang de' 'phags pa'i
'am yan lag brgyad pa dban zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i re ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'garang
sas rgyas kyisar yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pabasgom pa'i phyire de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am madra sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'
chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa'/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang nas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa 'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
pa'o// gang de 'a 'phags pa bden pa rnams bdagamad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsol ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thar sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par/
nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'a sngags pa'i bden pa rnams ni des bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bdenang rnams stong zhes bya
bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisachos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sde'am
'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'ibaden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatog par/
nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sbyor mi'ajug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa ni da res bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rung/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga nyid ma gtogs pa ra/ nyan thos kyi sa rim dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon
par 'du bya ba med ches bya bar de ma demigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston tsang/ duge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi se'am rang sas rgyus kyi
sa' lo ngas sa stsol mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bdenapa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pad ma

gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa khayongs su sngo 'ami'ajug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa 'badenapa rnams bsgom pa'i phyire nga mi dam shes pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge gzigs
rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ram rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yos sa sngor mi'ajug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya ba
]/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide ma gtogs pa'/ nyanathos kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
za sar yongs su sngol mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma rangasas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ma gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi
zhes bya bar de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangs sa rgyus kyi rayo susngor mi
'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag sa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/

nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sro'am 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtana rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma dmigs patshul gyise chos ston cing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba thawa cad kyang rnam po thamA
cad mkhyenapanyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi se 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa 'o// gang dal bsam gtam rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa// nyan thos kyi se 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam
gtana rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar do mdamigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yos su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsed ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'o ma dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'ag pa'o//
gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
kyi so 'am rang gangasargyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gangang la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanathos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyus kyi yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag mad/
ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsal ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs da ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
sngol 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams ni zhes bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spor mi 'jug pa 'o/ gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sa ngas rgyas kyi longs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med rtses bya bar de mi dmigs

'o pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa stod ma gtogs par/ nyan shes kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o/ gangad la tshad/
med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am bsang/

rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshadamod pa rnams mngon ng ra 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thamA

cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi theg pas nags rgyas kyi sa la yongs su stor te d+hAjug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams da na zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang/ nyid ma gtogs pa ra/ nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de 'a tshad med pa rnams bsgom
pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan gros kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo
ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnan sa mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa rngams cad
mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan bros kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs susngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid ma gtogs par/ nyakhros kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'os su sdor
mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzu gsad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzug
med pa'i snyams par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar dom dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag bal rtse ba rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma mdaces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisang yongs su sdor mi 'jugang// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamag
smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanagros kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod
su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de yagabrug sa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmanges pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de ma gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi sa lam dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdong ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dbyin zhes
bya ba'i de mi mgos nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar longasu sror ma'ag
pago gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshulargyan chos ston cing/ dgo/
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos susngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang nam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs bar nyan thos kyi sa larang sa rgyag
kyi sa' yongs usdorami'ajug pa'o// gang del rnam par thar pa rnams bdag mad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
tshe mkhyen nyid ma gtogasar/ nyan thos kyis ga rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang ba la rnam par thar pa rnamasu zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing//
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de ba rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes
bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyidamagatogs par nyan thos kyis 'charangasas rgyas kyi shes ra yongs su sngo mi
'jug pa'o/ gang da la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya ba ra de ma dmigs pa'itshul gyis chos hocing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam ba thams cad mkhyen banyidamagatogs pa/
nyan thosakyi sa marang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngog mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smyonapa mdatsas bya bar da mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba/
thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyisu 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar nga rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med
cas khyabar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogasapar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo
gi 'jug pa'o/ gang del rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi demigs nga 'i tshul gyis chos ston rung/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par/
nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyis ra yongs su sngon ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ ngagaba'i rtsa ba shAmA
cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanathos kyis 'ad rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su sngar 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa ngag
mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma rangs su rgyas kyi twA sasu spyor/

jugu ba'o/ gang del mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag sdugabasngal zhes bya bar demadamigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston ming/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma g.yos
ranyan thos kyi sa'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spomi'ajugapa'o/ gang de la mthar gyiso gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bya ba de mi dmigs
thapa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
mtha' gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs pa' sha
thos kyis 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
zhi ga ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha'agyos gnas pa la sems pa
la 'jug pa dag mtshan mamad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ram rang sas rgyag

kyis yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngag smonapa ma dag bya 'bad ni dgag pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham
cangamkhyen pa nyidam gtogs pa ra nyan thos kyi sa ma rangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du byaba medaces bya//

bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o//
gangade 'a mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma gtogs par//
nyan thos kyis 'am rang sa sargyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la mtha' gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/

dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid ma gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyide dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonang med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad kyang rnam pa thamasacang mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/

can thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar ba'i sge stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rangasangs rgyas sar 'ongs susngo mi 'jug//

ba'o// gang de la rnam nga ra thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma chod pa dang/ smonapa med pa bdag med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa 'o// gangad 'a rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa
dang/ smon pa mad pa ni zhes bya bar ng gi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ted ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasas
rgyas kyisarayongasasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong nga nyid dang/ mtshan ma nad pa dang/ smonapa med pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa khyon cing/
dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs bar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa mad pa mtshan madaces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston myong/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtog par/
kan thos kyi sa rta rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'ongs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang po' rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa med ces bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa kums cad mkhyenang nyid ra gtogs par/ nyanashes kyis ma rangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la sa
ba'atharapa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan gamadapa dang/ smo na pa med pa mngon brjod bya ba med ces bya bar re dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yos su sngor ma 'jug pa 'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
smonu ba med pa khenazhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
rgyas kyisar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing/
pag ka'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide ma gtogs pa ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de' mngon par shes pa rnams
mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa krams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma rangs
rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes

pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgeba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa sman ga cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
nusngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de 'a mngon nga shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos stan cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
lo ra/ nyan thos kyi red tsam rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngarami 'jug pa'o// gang de 'gas mngon pa shes pa rnams mtshan ma mdaces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad khyen pa de ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smonapa/
mad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo sa/
su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba mad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor me 'jug pa'o// gang da la mngon par shes pa rnams dban zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing/ ge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis lam rang sangs rgyas kyis ra yongs su sngorami 'jug pa'o// gang de la mno
parang shesal rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
cang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sngor mi'ajug go/ gang de la ting 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
ba dmigasapa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen nga nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ram rangs ngas rgyas kyi sar yig susbyor mi 'jug
pa'o// gang de la teng nge 'dzin rnams bdagald ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa la gnas rud kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
nyan thos kyi sa marang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar d mi dgos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ gaba'i rtsa ba thams cad
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug nga 'o// gang de [']ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmig
'tshulagyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
gang la ting nge 'dzin nams mtshan ma mdaces bya bar de midamigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston cing/ dgonga'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis/

'am rangasaargyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang da la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams/
cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang dag ting nge 'dzin nan sa mngon par 'du bya ba mad rus bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ gaba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis lam rang sas rgyas kyis yongs su las sdo'am 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'tsho/

rnams ngesazhes bya par dam demags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgapa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyidamagatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasas rgyas kyi sar yog susdor mi/
'jugapa'o/ gang de la ting 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma

rang sas rgyas kyi sa ra yos susngaram 'o jug pa'o// gang del kakhrus kyi sgo rnams mi rtagaces bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ ge ba'i rtse nyamasacad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
banyidam gtogs bar/ nyanathos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yogs por mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de 'gazungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
dge ba'i rtsawathams cad kyang rnam pa h+phams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su sdoram 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo

sba rnams bag med ces bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ ga ba'i rtsa ba tham cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar los su
sngo ni 'jug pa'o// gang del gzus kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtso ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan

gros kyi sa bama'ang sas rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thamA
cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa' 3nathos kyi sa lam rang sa rgyas kyi sar yos su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma nga ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
cing/ gab rtse ba thams cakyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la gzus kyi so rnams smon pa
mad ces bya bar de mi dmiges pa'i tshul gyis chog stocing/ dga' skyo ba thams chad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo mi
'gaba'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon ng 'du byang ched ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogrwa/
par nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi bar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi lam 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi ngamig
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rangasas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// ga
'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag partsi bshes gtanani/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtagaces gyi bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/
dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi thog 'am rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongasasusngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bsu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa// nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasas rgyas kyi/
sa yongs su sbomi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
chud kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi bar yongs su sbyor mi 'jugar 'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la zhes bya bar de
bats+tsa mdamigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis zas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sulor mi 'jug
pa'o/ ga pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ng/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams rudamkhyen nyid ma gtog pa
nyan thos kyi sa 'am nga sas rgyas kyis ra yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin ga shegasapa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge
pa'i rtsa ba thams nga kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa lta/ nyathos kyi sa'am ra sangs rgyas kyi sarayos su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smon/
pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs bar/ nyan thos kyis 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
sngo mi 'jug pa'o// nga del re bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med nus rgyabar dan dmago pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad kyang rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen banyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yos sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de midamigs pa'i tshul
gyis chos stocing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi saralogs su sngo mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de
bzhin gshags pa'i stobasang rtsubasgom pa'i phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par nyan thos kyi sa
gangasas rgyas kyi sar yongs bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa bzhim rtagaces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stoming/ dgeba'artse ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs susngo ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la ma 'jigs pa rnams skrag bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'amarangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myor ma'i ga pa'o// gang de la mi 'jig
pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos

kyis lam 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngon gyi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi'i sa bya bar de ma dmigasar 'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thags cad kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyi ma gtogs nga ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya ba de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa
ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanathos kyi sa 'amarangs sargyas kyi sar yos su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi'ajigs pa
rnams latshanamed ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi rgyus ma rang sangs rgyas
sar los su sor ma 'jug pa'o// gang la mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen nyid ma gtogs pa'i/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'ojug nga 'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba' de mo ligs pa'i tshul

saralos su sngor mi 'jug pa ko/ gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag mdaces bya bar re mo demigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
@#// nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rige pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul/

gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'angasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de ma dmiges pa'i rnyol gyis chos ston cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend nying ma gtogs par/ nyanas kyi sa lam rang gangs rgyas kyi
yongs su sngor ma'ijug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgu ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nying mgatogs par/ nyanathos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang du la la so yang dag pa zhig pa rnams smyon pa mang ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul/
gyis chos ston da/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogis par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am yang sangs rgyas kyi sor los su sror mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag
bar theg pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba'i de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ ga ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de lasoso yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dgo ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi bojug pa'o// gang de laso so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs
ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyisa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs susngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
la snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sangs

rgyusakyi sar yongs su sngor mi'i drag pa'o// gangade la snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa/
nyi ma gtogs par/ nyan thes kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasaMsu'usngor 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar de ga re gos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs pa'i/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sas rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor mi'ajugapa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po zhe zhes bya bar
de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar
yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po snying zhes bya bar da li dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnamA pa thams cad mkhyen nyid ma gtogs/
tsha par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyusakyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lasnying rje chen po mtshan ma mad ces bya bar du ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa
ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyanazlos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis ra yongs su stor mi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la snying rje chen pa smon pa med ces
bya ba'ade ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nying mgatogs par/ nyan thos kyis ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du byab med cas bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa bra thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sor 'jug pa'o// gang de la sIng rje chen po dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'irtsab
thags cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan shos kyis 'al rang sangs rgyas kyi ra yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i phyir de medamigA
pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan rjes kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa 'o//

gangade lasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtags bya bar nge medamigs pa'i tshulagyis tshesasten cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs snga ru//

nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de lasasargyus kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smyug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmags pa'i tshul gyis sa ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ hran thos kyi sa 'am rang sa sa rgyus kyis yongs su sgor mo 'jug pa'o// gang de las ngas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag
med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston tsang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidamagatogs par/ nyanazlos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos su

sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lasangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng ma gtogs
par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de midamigs pa'i tshul gyis/
chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis lam rasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs suphror ma 'jug pa'o// gang de las ngas rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar dam dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos ston tsang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad kyang rnam pa shAms cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa

'am rang sangs rgyas kyi se ra yongs su sngoramo 'jug pa'o// kang de la sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar da dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du
bya ba tshad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'das kyi sar yongs
su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gde la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar nge mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis tshes ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
0/ panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'os rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'di phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rangs ngas rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa 'o// gang de la rnam pa/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom nga 'a phyir de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis ram rang
sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir du mi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis chos stanacing/ dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen
pa nyid ma gtogs pa ra/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bram po
zhabadun pa/// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dang 'gams dang 'a chen po'i rig ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen pon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi snang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
[jp]// byang chub sems dpa' sum dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'a rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa'i tsha/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin babastan ba 'dithos na 'jigs shing srang la sla//
bar 'gyur zhing thugs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po lagatu lhung zhing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yos suspangs pa lags/ bcom ldaka'adas kyis bka' stsal tra/ rab 'byor

'di la byang chub sems dang phams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phalo tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin kha
sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bas mgatanagyi pha rol tu phyin pa

sgrom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlomasams su byung pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyingadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra brtson 'grusakyi pha rol tu phyin pasgom
zhing dmags te/ brtson 'grus kyi sngotu phyin pa des rlomasamasasu byed pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ngamad par brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba sgom zhing dmigs

taM bzod pa'i pha rol tu khyen bdes rlom baas su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrim

[ral]kyi pha rol tu phye ba des m mas su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan payad la bya ba mang par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin/
pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ ra 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhasapar rig par bya'o// rab 'byoragazhan/
yang byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenabanyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nastongapanyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid rung

ldan ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// dba shes rab kyi

pa rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yidal byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sesams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yod labya ba med par/ gzugs
stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisastong ba nyade stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab/

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lakhyab med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
ba nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mdabar//
gzugs don dam pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam bstong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stongapa nyid kyisakyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs 'dus byas song nga zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa zams rdud mkhyen pa nyid dung ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzug
'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// do shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la so da ba 'tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi mtha'
las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyid dang ldanu ba'i
yid la khyu ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

rlom semasusu byed do// de shes rab kyi rtsa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugasader ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba spyod pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rabrakyi b.rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ rnamapa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab mad par/ gzugs rang bzhan stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dolags la/ stong ba
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamus su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thamasarbadamkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med bar/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed do dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid kyadamigasal/song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa mas su byang ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thamaAcad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba med
par gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mingamigs pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasems su byed do// de
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs
ba'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// deshes rngub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngob nya stong pa nyid kyang ngomigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

samasasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyadistong bzhes byabar/
yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yidi la byed de/ dmigs
ja' tshul gyisanang stong ba nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad
ldan pa'i yid la byab madra bar/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyistong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor buphyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
gying stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongo ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
/ @#// ba mad par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rom

sams su byed da// de[–] shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed do/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang damigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang tshomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadung
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshar ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'itshul gyis den dam pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyad kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyingadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad do// dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang pa'icho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'iyad la bya ba
! mad pa ra/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulargyas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

[8 ]rab kyi rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lhan du 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshar ba ma h+phal las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed nge/ ngamigs pa'i tshul

gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tham mang pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomaM
sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong/
[p]/ @#// pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dAmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba med par tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyid dang ldan pa'i mod la
bya ba mad par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul rgyus ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed//

de shes rab kyi phu rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis dngos po ming ba stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa'i deb 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos bo
mda'i ngob nyidi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ 'du shesanang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmagis
la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasas byed de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ 'du shes phyi stong
ba zhes bya bar yid la khyed nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rlabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ 'du shes phyin ng stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang da'i gos la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes stong pa nyid
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi

pha srol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thamasacadu mkhyon pa'i 'dangang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ 'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yang labyed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chen bskong

ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes

dam pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom samasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyida' napa' yid la bya ba mad par/'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/

da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dushes 'dusum byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byeng da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas gong

bad kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang slom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bamang par/ 'du shes mtha' las 'das bang

pa panas bya bar yid la byed du/dmagang pa'i bgyis na las 'das pa stong nga 'od kyang dmigs la//stong pa nyid kyis kyang blom sems su byed do// de shes gzakyi pha rol duphun pa la yod pa'i tsha rnam bzlumasacad mkhyen bzhin

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zheka bya bar yang la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasems

byed do/ do shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lasprongang 'tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bamed par/ 'du shes dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa

stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyi ngomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya ba

yal byed de/ dmags pa'i tshulagyis rang bzhin stongapa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang romasamasusu byed ngo/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab
med par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
rab kyi pha rolaM tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar/
yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan 'i yi de la bya ba mang par/ 'du shes mdamigs pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mdamigs pa/

stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medabar/

'du shes dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang damigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi ba lotu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ 'dushes nge bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
mgas la/ stong pa nyidagyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medapar/ 'dushes dgos/

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngeb nyidi stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor/

gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' sums dpa' chen po da shes rab kyi pha sprel tu phyin pa la stod pad+mo tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byad nang stong pa/

zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyidakyang dmigs lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ 'du shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cad m khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byang phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya pa chod pa ra/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmagis pa'i

tshul gyis phyi nang song ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnamakha thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed stongapa nyid ma pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin g 'aspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya ba mad par/ 'du byed chen po steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamags nga 'i nu9

0/ khyu// kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyajarlom sems su byed do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

pa'i yid la bya ba med par dra 'du byed don dam ba stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de//
da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid 'a khyad de/ dmigs pa'i
tshulangs 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma sems su byed dro// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan
ba'i yade la bya ba med par/ 'du byung 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang/ rngamigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lta/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa khrid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ 'du byad mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la/
byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thegam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phrod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la byab mdapur/ 'du byed der ba mang ba stong pa zhes

bya bar yade la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis der ba mang pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nying kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod nga 'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba mad par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa chod kyang dmigs la/ stong pa ched kyis

kyang rlom sems su dung do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srodapa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyung ngang sngaru nga 'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar ya de la byang

de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cungastong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa ra yang la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed nga/ ngamangs ba'i tshul rgyas rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad po// rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zams cad mkhyen
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dubyed m demags pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul rgyasem dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang damagal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams

su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ 'du byed dngos bo med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid l phyud ra/ dmigs
ba'i tshul gyis dngos po med pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byadado// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam ba thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yade la phyag med par/ 'du bye ngo bo nyidastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyabadamegos la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed

do/ desher rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed//
dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ng de nying stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa sbams cad mkhyen pa nyeng drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed nge/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyisanang song pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnyom sams su byed de/ du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
mang par/ rnam par shes pa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa phyin ng songapa zhes bya bar yid la byadango/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang

stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam
par shes pa stong pa nyid [”]stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid sengapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// nga shes rab kyi
pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par rnam par shes pa chen po songapa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen
dnga shes rab kyi phu rol tu phyin pa 'phrad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam bar shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du//

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa/dkyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas songang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig/sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

rloms/mas su byung ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba mang par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar

yid la byed nge/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang de/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid drang lamapa'i yid la bya ba mang par rnam par shes pa mal las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmag

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zams cad mkhyen pa nying ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes ba thog ma/

ngang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedung/ ngamags pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma mad pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha la tu phyi

pa 'a spyod pa 'tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisangor ba mad pa stong pa nyid

kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa

rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamakas pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang damagal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i

tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mid par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa 'dakya dmigs/

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa rang gamtshan

nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lagrong
pa'i/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba byed par/ rnam par shes pa medamigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yidra la phyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi mi mig/

pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ng// ye shesrarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// degs/

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yeng la bya ba mad par rnam par shes pa dro be nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul

gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa 'tshe kyang dmags la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// denga shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yod la
bya bsad par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo 'disong pa zhes bya ba yod la byang nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i bo 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlom sems su byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
la bya ba med par/ mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi

ngol tu phyin pa la spyod pasde/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig pha stong pa zhes bya bar yid 'khud de/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs

la stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong nga 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mag phyi nang stong pa zhes bya
ba yid la bud de/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang nge/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stongapa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa

nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byadango// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga 'a mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba mad par/ mig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
yang la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ ma pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ migaderangs pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid 'khrid de/ dmigs pa 'a tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang/ thamangam byan
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang blo sems su bad dre// de shes rab kyi snga rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig 'dus

tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsad par/ ludangos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos pomad
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

ba thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang nu pa'i yid la bya ba mdabar/ lus bya nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong ba nyid kyis

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsad nga ra/ lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i//
