0 dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba med par/ lus thog ma dang tha ma mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad 'byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyayapem sams su byed de// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba mad par/ lus dor ba ma pa stong ba zhes bya bar
yid la byed de/ dmigasapa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom pa las su byang do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba mad par/ lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba
nyid kyis kyang tshem sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ lus chos ljams cad
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa phritshul gyis chos thams cudostong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedapa nyid dang ldanupa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ lus rangagi mtshan nying stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmagis pa'i tshul gyis
rang gi mtshan nyid stongapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongapa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rang kyi rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mdamigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramag pa'i tshul gyis mdamigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya du mad par/ lus dngos po yod pa stong pa zhes bya
bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byadang// de shes rab kyil rol tu phyin pa la sbyong

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus ngo ba nyang stong pa zhes bya bar ya nga la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom mas su byang ro// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamadud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ lus dngos po mad pa'i ngob
nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed da/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po mid pa'i ngo ba nyang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhabargyud pa/// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la stong pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad ma byan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ yi dran ng stong pa zhes bya bar yid labyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang damigs
la stong pa 'di kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dranga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da ngad ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mad phyi stong ba

med bar/ med rang bzhin stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes

tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[% ]dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ngomasams su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'asoms dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid

phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang romasamasaMsu byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/gzugs stong pa nyid

stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byadad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

su byed do// de shes rab kyi ba brel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 'byab med par/gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed re// de shes rab kyi pha rol tun pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs

'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems suphyed do// de shes rab kyi pha tshel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamA

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma

sams su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam bya thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ gzugs thog ma dang tham med pa stongapa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul

gus thog ma dang tham med pa stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab med

bar dgazugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang blomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod

ba pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de/ dramags pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong

pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsad par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes khyabar yar

la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyidagyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu man ba laspyod pa 'tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da na pa'i

yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyidra kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang masemasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ gzugs ma ngamigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul/
gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidrangang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ gzugs ngo ba nyid
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis po'o 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed du// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang bar gzugs dngos po med pa'i de khanyang stong pazhes bya bar yod la byed d/ dgags pa'i tshul gyis das po mong ba'i
bo nad stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyadad// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
pa laspyod pa'i tshi/ rnam bzams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong ba nyung rgyas kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yadra la bya ba mad par/ sgra phyi stod
pa zhes khyabar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dazhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/
[j] rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa'/ sa phyi nang stong ba zhes byabar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yun dngapa nyid kyang damags la/ stongab nyid/
kyis kyang rlomasums su byed de// deshes rab kyi pha rol tun pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'a yid la bya ba med par slastong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de song pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thanas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba mad pa ra/ sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ megs pa'i tshul gyis chen stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyidakyis
kyang l sa mas su byed do/ dra shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yadul bya bskrad par/ sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed do/ dmigs pa 'tshul gyis donadam ba stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byungado// de shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa' tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sgra'adus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlom sems su spyod do/ re shes rab kyi ba log tu phyin par sbyod pa'i m/ rnam pa mas cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsad pa ra/ sgra'adus ma byas/
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngolags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid labya ba mad par/ sgra mthul las 'das pa stong pa zhes byakhuratshadi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa nyid kyang dusags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang romasams su byed do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba

mang par shu sa thog ma dang tha ma mod pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham med pa stong ba nyidakyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed
ngo/ dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa' tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ sgra dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis ngor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmegs ba'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmags la// stong pa 'dre kyis kyang rjes sams su byed do//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba yod par/ slar ng gi mtshan nyang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigasapa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par smra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyingagyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
mos saMms su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ sga ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes

bya bar yang la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa de kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad

mkhyen pa nyid dang 'a nupa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sladangos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa 'i deb nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmages la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byang ngo// rab 'byor zhan yang byang chub sems dang lngasams dang 'a chen po dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i/ rnam pa tha mdzad
cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ drazhing stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa 'di kyis kyang rlom

sams su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprong nga 'tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidu dung ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ dri phu stong pa zhes bya bar ya de la bud de/ dmigs

ba'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis glang rlom sems su byang ngo/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyodang re tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i
yid la bya ba mad par/ dra phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas phyin nga song ba nyid kyanamigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byab med par/ dri steng pa nyid la thabs da song pa zhes bya bar med la byed du dmigs ba'i tshul

gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlomasams su byed do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ rnam pa phramasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i
'di la bya ba mad par/ srin po stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de bsab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa h+phams cad mkhyen pa nyide ngang lan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dwa don dam pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
stong pa nyid kyang dmegs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom soms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam bo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la
bya ba mad par/ dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlom sems su byed do//
nga shes rab kyi pa rol du phyin pa lasprod pa'i tsho/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mad par/ dri 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de//
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// da shas rab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa laspyong pa'i cho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ drin tha' las 'das nga stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 'a/ stong pa nyid

kyis kyang ngom sums su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri thog ma dang tha ma mang ba stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang thal mad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmagang la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byed nga// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ drider ba madra pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dar ba mad pa stod pa nyeng kyang
tsa dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba med par/ drirang
bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid 'byed de/ dzamigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnyomasams su byed blo// de shes lab kyi parol tu phyin
pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ drichos thamasacad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams

stong pa 'di kyang dmugs la/ stong pa nyid kyisakya rnams masasu byed do// dungashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medabar
dIrang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// denga shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ dri ma dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis mi
dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bye ba med par/ dri dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom soms su bya do//
nga shes rab kyi ba rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dring ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//
dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang ngar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'ang stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed da/ dmags pa'i tshul gyi dngos po med pa'i nge ba 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//
stong pa ched kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor ba zhan yang byang chub sa mas dang 'a sems dpa' chen po du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ renang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyadekyis kyang rlomasams/
su byad da// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ re phya stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed d/ dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis pha stong ba nyid kyang dmigasal stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ba cha/ ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyid bar/ re phu nang stong ba zhes bya bar 'dra la byang de/ dmugs pa'i tshul gyis gyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// du shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ rnamA ba sbrags cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yud la bya ba mad par/ re stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang l byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisastong pa nyid

stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byadadaM// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lade la bya ba med
par/ rotshan bo stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ migs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba la spyod pa tsa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ ro dron dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dron dam pa stong pa nyid
kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sums su byadado// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la sbyong pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdabur/
ro'adus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// ngashes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ngamad par/ 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang m sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
rdzun pa'i yid la bya bsad par/ ro mtha' nas 'dus pa stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis mtha' 'dus 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang
masems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa' mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ re thegam dang shAm mang ba song ba zhes bya bar spyod
yod labyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang masams su byadad// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/
rnam pa zams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba mad bar/ re dor ba mad pa stong pa zhes bya ba yad la byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyisader ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
! stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha roladu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la byakhamed par/ ro rang bzhin stong/
0/ pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang legs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang smon sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mang par/ re chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rol sams su byadado// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/
rorangag mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yudi la bya ba mad par/ drom dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramags pa'i tshul gyis
ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal stod panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// de shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidul
bya ba mdar/ ro dngos bo med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dashas
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ re ngo ba 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bud do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba med par/ ro dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i nge po'ang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
soms su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
la bya ba med par/ reganang nga pa zhes bya bar yid byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya bamang par/ rag stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa
nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
mag par/ ngeg phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong ba nyid kyang datshugs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang lAnaba'i yid la bya ba mad par/ reg stong pa nyud pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs pa'i
tshul gyi sa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems s khyadado// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rog chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisachen bo stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasazhu
byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par spyod par tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rogadenadam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yadel byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmugs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa' ni/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ reg 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong ba nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg 'dus ma byas
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas la 'das pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
laspyod pa'i tsho rnam thams cad mkhyen pa'i dudang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba mang par/ reg mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das/

pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang romasams su byed do// dushes rlabakyepha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nye dung ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang/
par/ regathog ma dang tham med pa gyong pa zhes bya ba yid 'byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do//
da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dor ba mang ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyangodamags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
tsha/ ldan pa la yid la bya ba mad bar/ reg rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin sodapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su/
byadango// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la khyab med bar/ regachos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmig
ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyadamigs la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang lanaba'i yid la bya ba medapar/ reg rangag mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmagres pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 'a// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
somasal byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rig midamags pa stong pa zhes bya bar yodal
byed du dmigs pa'i tshulagyisamedamigs pa stongapa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad do// do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams
namkhyen nyid dang ldan ba yod pa phul med par/ rig dngos po med pasong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongapa nyid/
dkyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// nga shes rab kyi ba rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rigango'o//
chung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ regadangos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po yod/
pa'i ngo ba nyang stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rom sams su byedu do/ rabu 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems drapa'i sams dpa' chen pa da shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos nang stangang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
dramigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin palasbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos/
phya stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed re/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 'a// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tsho rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ ches phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ daigs pa'i tshul gyis phye nasong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
kha nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos stong pa nyid
gong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyidistong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyaparlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod bar tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l bya bamang par/ chos chen po steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang damags
'ostong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed d// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos don dam pa stong
pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de/ 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dusabyas song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlomasums su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ ]
chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rngamigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi phra
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis
mtha' las 'das postong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed ngo// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

ba'i yid la bya ba mad par ches thog ma dang bla ma mang pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ogs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom semasusu byad do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos dar ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byeng de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba mang ba stong pa nyid kyong dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos rang bzhin song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
gyur rlom sems su byed do/ da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med pa 'a/ chos chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byeded/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rgod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba chud par/ chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed nge/ dmigasapa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan zhing stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
skyob pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha la lubyin ba laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldapa'i yid la bya ba medapar chos ma dmigs pa stong pa
zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byadad// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang l byed ng/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos bo med pa stong
pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems u byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/
pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chos lob 'di stong pa tshos bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nya stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa de gyes kyang rlom sams su byed do//
du shes rab kyi pha ro'an tuphyin pa la song pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yabu la byed do/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngag 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'i
chen po da sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba med pa ra/ mig gi rnam par shes panang song pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mgi ga rnam par shis pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang labyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
0/rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa
zhes bya bar yib byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phunang song ba nyid kyang dramagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/

la bya ba mad par mig gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byadang/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ros
sams sukhyad do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig gi rnam da ra shes pa don dam

kha stong ba zhes bya bar yid la bya de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// da shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/

byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad bar/

bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis midamigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa 'tshe rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mgag rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar tshul byed/ ma'i sa bgyis dngos po med pa

kim par sang nge bo'i stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed//dmigs pa tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang don gnad lta su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad

spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rna ba'i ma par shes pa mang stong pa zhes bya bar yid lakhyadar/ dmigs pa'i tshulargyasi nang

mad par/ rnabra'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmagApa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad dro//

zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' 'as 'jas pastong pa nyidakyadamags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu na
mtsha pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yud la bya ba mad par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thogam dang sbrum mud pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigA
pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang+karemasams su byed do// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidre la bya ba medra par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dur ba mad pasong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis dor ba madrapa stong pa nyid
kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ cudangashes rub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba
med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shis par ng bzhan stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ngo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyade kyang damagras la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem

ba zhes bya bar yade la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa red kyang dmigs la/ stongang nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa la spyongapa'i tshe/ rnam pa sbrams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

nas phya bar yid la byed nga/ dmags pa'i tshul gyisanang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pharel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams

par/ snya'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma mud pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

stong pa zhes bya bar yong la khyad du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisader ba mud pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma sams su byad do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod
pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya khamadapa raM/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong po
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom samus su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ stsa'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmogs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi

grol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sA'i rnam par shes pa me dmags pa stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa ljams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid
la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam pa rashes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po mad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyed kyis kyang rlom

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsad par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidstong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa 'i nga ba nyid

rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rom sams su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ jamags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan ba dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams
cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldanupa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig gi 'dus tA reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong nga nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la
song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasAms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tun pa la spyod
ba'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya khamed par/ mig gi 'dus te regrupa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang
stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyad kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dengashas rub kyi rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa 'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la gyi
mad par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyidastong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byad do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kring dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa chen po/
stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas chen bo stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don
tha @#// dam pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// denga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i/ / rnam pa sbrams cad mkhyen pa nyid
drang ldan pa'i yid 'a bya ba mad par/ mig gi 'dus te reg ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ng/ rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yude la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te
rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang damagasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dungashes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'dras pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
byed de/ dmigs pa 'a tshul gyis mtha' bar pa stong pa nyid kyang dusags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// dbas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng 'i yid la bya ba med par/ mag ka 'dus te rag pa thog ma dang tha ma med mastong pa zhes bya ba yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang

thaTha/ thum med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom khams su byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid rang ldan ba'i/
yid la bya ba med par/ mig gu'adus te reg ba der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dusagegs pa'i tshul gyis dor bkod pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba tshudabar/ mig ga'adus ta rig pa rang bzhin stong pa
zhes bya bar yid la byadad/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyade kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma gi'adus te reg pa chos thamasacad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis
sa thams cad stong ba nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yod la bya ba med par/ mgag 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyidastong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong nga ni
nyid kyis kyang rlomasamus su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/
mig gi 'dus te reg pami dramigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmags pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong nga nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su/
byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yadi la bya ba mad par/ mgag 'dus tra rig pa dngos po med nga stong pa zhes byabar/
yid la khyodad/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos bo mdab stong nyid kyang dmags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byadado// de shes tA kyi rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams
cang ma khyon ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba tshud pa ra/ mag ge 'dus tA reg padre btad stong pa zhes bya bar thang la byed de/ dramags pa'i tshul gyis ngo banyid stong pa skyid kyang dmags la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mig gi 'dus tu reg pa

dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngasogs pa'i tshul gyisadangos po mad pa'i ngo ba nyad stongang nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// rab
'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' semasudang ' chen pong shes rab kya pa re' tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnab 'dus te

ngag pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la phye 'de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisanang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

nga'i tsa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa yang la bya ba mad par/ rna ba'i 'dus tureg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang d/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang ngasogs

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba laspyod nga 'i tsho/ rnam pa thamasacad akhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus tA reg ba/

phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulakyis phyi nang stong ba nyid kyang ngomugasal/ stong ba'i da kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i
tsha rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid bas rtsa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa stod

stongapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa mas su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba med par/
rnaba'i 'dus te reg pachen bo stong pa zhes bya bar yid la khyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chepo stong pa nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang romasams su bye bo/

dngashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnaba'a'idus tareg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis donang nga stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se lasu byang de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan ng 'i yid la bya ba ma da ra ra/ rna ba'i 'dus pa rigs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sdod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya bamed par/ rnabu'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma
byas stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byang nga/ dmagras pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigasulastong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su khyad do// dngashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyan pa
la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen nga nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshug
gyis mtha' las 'das pa song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi sngol tu phyin pal song pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng dang/
ldan pa'i yang l bya ba med par/ rna ba' 'dus ta reg pa thogam dang tha ma mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su phud de// de shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rna pa'i 'dus te
reg pa dor ba mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang nga/ ngamags pa'i tshul gyis dor bamang pasong pa nyid kyang dmugs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyud do// da shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa gsas rung mkhyen pa nyang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ rnaba'i 'dus te regang rang bzhin stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmags

pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dramigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasunas su byed do// deng nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprong nga 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad bar//

rnaba'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga 'i yudi lu bya bam dpar/ na ba'i 'dus te regang ma dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byadang/
dmags pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stongang zhes bya bar yid la byang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med po stong pa nyid kyang ngam gal 1 stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems subyed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i lade la bya bamang bar/ rna ba'i 'dus te regapa

ngo bo 'de stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyidstong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deng shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lAnasi' yid la bya ba mad par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa 'i ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rwayegs pa'i tshul
gyis dngos bo mad pa ring bo nyang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da shes rab kyi
ba re la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'de dang ldan nga 'i yid la bya
ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dumigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dengashes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade dung lanang 'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis yunang song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprong pa 'i tsho/ rnam pa thams rung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la byab chud par/ sA'i 'dus te reg pa byung dra nye 50 stong bzhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sA'i 'dus te
reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyingadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sna'i 'dus te drag pa ngon dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i
tshul gyis ngomadam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
du ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sna'i 'dus par g pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stod du
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su sbyong do// do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba mad par/ snya'i 'dus ter

nga 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yang lubyeng de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngumigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i rtsod la bya ba med par/ sA'u'adus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pazhes bya bar yod la byed da/ dmigasapa'i tshul gyis

ma bra' la 'dra ba stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

gling la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang shul mang pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thegam drang tha ma chung pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa sbrums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba
mdang stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par snya'i 'dus rta rag pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lu/stong pa nyid kyis gyang blonas mas su byed do/ da shes rab kyi yab shel tu phyin paspyod pa'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa 'i yi dbu b.lapar/sA'adus te reg
ba chos thams cad stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ mgos nga 'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyad kyang damugs 'a/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab

ga la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ snya'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs ba'i/
tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// du shes rab kyi pha rol duphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snya'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa/
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snya'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po
mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasa'/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

wan+ti/ phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ snya' 'dus purig pa ngo ba nyidi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa ngo/

bo 'di so ba pa nyid kyang dmugs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byed de// dang shes rab kyi 'a rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la khyab
mad par/ snya'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo de nyadestong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid
kyisakyang rlom sems su byung ngo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyon ba te/
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stongapa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyisan stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongapa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dre la bya ba mad nga ra/ lu'i 'dus te reg pa phyi song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/

dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis
kyang rlom sems su byadango// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medubur/ lce'i 'dus te reg ba stong ba nyid mal
stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dumags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ lce'i 'dus terag ba chen po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chon bo stongang na
kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ sbya'i
'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasrasu byed do// de shesab
kyil rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa/'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs ba'i
00 tshul kyig dug las stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang tshom soms su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnamab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa khrod dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par lce'i 'dus te reg pa thogam dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya ba ru yid la byed de/ dmigs

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ide la bya bar da bar/ lce'i 'dus te reg ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ ngams pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/

tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshorab do ba mal stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba mad pa stong pa nyid kyang damagasA la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

song pa zhig bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang datsags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su myong do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de//

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rgyad bar/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba rang ga mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ legs pa'i tshul gyis dra
gamtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsha/ rnamu pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyid dang ldan pa'i
yang la bya ba mad par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis mdamigs pa stong pa nyid kyapangamag
la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig
gi 'dus tureg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang d/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlom sams su byang ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam nga shams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ migag 'dus te reg
'a[; ]ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshulagyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do//
de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po ang
pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid 'o byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su 'byed ngo//
rab 'abyor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chanango de shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/
rna ba'i 'dus tre rig pa'i rgyun gyis tshor banang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dramags la/ stongapa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byadado//

dwashagarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnaya pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar/

su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnan pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhwa de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya khamed bar/ snya'i 'dus te rig pa'i kyin gyis tshor
