zhes byabar yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis napa ngapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dgashagrwa rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyin

nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams la stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed/ bsigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa [”]pakyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// des

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ chu'i khams pa rang stong pa zhes bya bar yongal byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyin ng stong
pa nyid kyang ng gsal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ dnga shes rab kyapha rol tuphyin pa laspyod pa 'tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/
chu'i khams stong pa nyid ngapa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stangapa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed nga// de
! gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacabamkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i idel bya ba mad par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byede// dmegs ba'i tshul

[4/ ]gyis chen po stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dpa' che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/

par nu'i khams demadam pa gostong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i Ade la bya ba mad par/ chukhams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su khyudade// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cadramkhyen bting dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
par chu'i khams 'dus ma byas song ba zhes bya bar yid la byadang/ dmagras pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do/ 'dogs

rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyung dung ldan pa'i yong la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang daM/ dmigs ba'i

tshul gyis mtha' las nga stong pa nyid kyang ngamigasal/ stod pa nyid kyisakyang rlom sems su khyadad/ da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
yabrel bya ba medu bur/ chu'i khams brog ma dang bum mang pa stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mdang ma med pastong pa nyid kyang ngamags la//

stong bad kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// donga shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldanuba'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ chu'i khams dar ba da pa stong

pa zhes bya bar yid la byang nga/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyisador ba med pa stong pa nyarekyang dmags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sa mA su khyed do// de g shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cung mkhyen pa nyungang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba madra par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yang labyengang/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stongapa nyid kyang ngamags la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasasu byadango// denga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa' yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chos thams
cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos thamasacudasong pa de kyang dmigs la/ stong nga nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasas byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin
pa la spyod nga 'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byengang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi/
mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid/
la bya ba mad par/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisamo ngamigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmages la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed/

ngo du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyingadung ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa 'dakyabadamigs la/ stong pa khrid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nying ngangaldan

pa'i yid la bya ba ra par/ chu'i khams ngobro 'de stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de//

deses rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smyung ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa 'a bo 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedur/

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong panyid kyang ngamigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang nubasems dpa' samasadapa'i chen po da shes rab kyi
reb tuphyin nga laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gad la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang

stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom stegs su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i

khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa teng kyang ngamags la/stongang nyod kyis kyang rlom sems su byungado// deshas rab kyi ba rel tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i

tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medapa'/ ma'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyin stengong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongapa nyid
kyis kyang rlom sems su byung// de shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya'amapa la/ me'akhams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stongapa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 'a/ stong pa nyeng kyis kyang masams su byed ngo// de sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
pa kyam bsamalagyis ngoms pastong pa'i khams 'dus byas dpa'i tshe/ rnam lngags la/ stong thang pas bya bar yid largyadabamkhyen pa nyid la
ma gsas su byung ngo// de shes rab byang dmags la/ sangs nga sgrub bya bar ming la byed de byams nyid ngang lon pa'i yebs bu byed do// de shes rab kyi lam las las

kya rom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam bshagasacudaakhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma' khamasangon dam pa stong ba zhes byabar yid la byed/
ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis donadam pa stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnyem sams su byed// dra shes rab kyi larel tu phyin pa la sprodapa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nying dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong banyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su byed do// de ses rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba mad par/ ma khams 'dus ma byas stong
pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/ stong pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la/
ma' khams thog ma dang thum mang bstong pa zhes phyag ma de budang/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis thog ma dang tha ma mang ba stong pa dang sumigs la/ stong ba nyid kyisakya rnam sams su

byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams phud mkhyen pa nyidAdang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ mkhrikhams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba mad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma sems su byed do// de las rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams rang bzhin stongang zhes bya bar yang l byed de/ dmags pa'i tshulargyus rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dang shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams chos thams cad
stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cadustong pa nyid gyadamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tsho rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma' khams rang gi mtshamanyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gimtshan nyid stong pa nyid
kya padamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa lasdud pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yeng la bya ba med par/ ma'i
khams li dmags pa sengang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis ma dmigs pa stong pa nyer kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang remasams su byad do// dra lags rab kyi

phra rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa sngams cad mkhyen pa nyedrangang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mu'u khams drangos po madra pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmagos pa'i tshul
gyis dngos po med stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ ma' khams ngo bo nang stong pa zhes bya par yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su

khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa' tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/mkhams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la
byed nga/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byad ngo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sams dang 'asems
dpa' chen po da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la//
byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dasogs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medabar/ rlung gi khams phya stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong ba nyid kyang dmags laM/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlom sems su byed de/ dngashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par rlung ga khams phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar
yang la byang de/ sogs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyidakyang dmagos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tshe/ rnam pa tham
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ dgi khams stong pa nyid [']stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
[z/ ]yid la byed de/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs 'a/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma phamasusu byed d// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad/

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dzayong la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngon dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ songapa nyid kyis
kyang rlon sa mas su byed de// de bas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i m/ rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes
bya khar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang damagras la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang pa'i tshi/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong nga zhes bya bar yid la bya de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
kyi dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang nom sems su byang du// du sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad
par rlung gi khamasamatha' las 'das pa stongang zhes byakhar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'angs ba stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasems su byed//
da shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med bur/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tham mdang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang thal med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad do// de sha rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'itsha rnam pa

thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ drangag khams der ba med ba stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong

pa nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes

bya bar yid la byed de/ ngasogs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigasel/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
akhyenab nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs nga 'tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmagasal/stong pa

nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang gamtshan nyid stong

0 pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs ba'i tshulagyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongang nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed da// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tsha rnam pa bram sacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid labya ba mang par/ rlung gi khrams midamags pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi ngamaMgs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmig

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su khyad do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med nga ra/ rlung gi khams dngos po/
mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyidakyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa la

spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo po nyingastong pa zhes bya bar yodra la byed d/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nya stongang nyid kyang dmigs

la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ rlungagi khams dngos po ma

pa'i ngo bo nyid stengs zhes bya ba yid la bya de/ migs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo/ rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ nam mkha'i//
khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chung stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tsha/ rnam bathams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phya stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs
la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi

nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyang dang lamapa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig

N+NaM la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed ngo// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprophapa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyad ngang ldan pa'i yang la bya pa med par/ nam mkha'akhams chen

pa gongang zhes bya bar yad la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyeng gyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams donadam pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs

la stong ba nyid kyi rang blom sa mas su byed de// dre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tsha/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byadang/ dmigs pa'i tshulaglu'adus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmag

la stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang da// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng 'a yang la byab mang par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha'
las 'das pa stongapa zhes bya ba yod la byed de/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byang nga// dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la khu ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams sgrog ma dang tha ma mang pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya de/drasagasanga'i/

tshul rgyus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang roms mas su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan ba nyid dang ldan
ba' yang la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khamasador ba mdub stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dor bamed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams

kha su phyed de// dranga shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong gnas bya bar yid la byed de//
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang damags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
khrid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdu bar M/ nam mkha'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramags ba'i tshul gyis chos thums cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba

[à ]nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byadado// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams rangagamtshan

pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma dmigs pa stong po

nyid kyang dmigs la stangang nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang do// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ nam
mkha'i khams dngos po mang pa stong pa zhes byabar yad la byang ng/ dmigs pa'i tshulagyis dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byadad// ngengashas
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'apyad pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdabar nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stongapa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmags pa'i tshul

gyis ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyang dmigs/ stong ba nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang pa'i tshe/ rnam pa brams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang lngamapa'i yings

bya ba mad par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yidal byang de dmags pa'i tshulakyis dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmagis la/ stong pa nyid kyis khyad
ma sems su byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dbalusems dpa' chen po dang shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa skrags camkhyen pa nyid dang/
ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// rnam par shes pa'i khams na stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang song pa nyid kyang migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol dubyin ba laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam bar nas ba'i bams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yadal byang de/dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya

pa brgyad par rnam par shes pa la khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dasogs pa'itshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma sems su byed do// du shes pa

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong nga 'tsha/ rnam pa klams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yodi la bya bamang par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong nyid kyis kyang rlomasems su byang do// da shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba med par

ca rnam bzang gas ba'i khams chen po song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

la tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nying ngang ldan pa'i yid 'tshubya ba mang par rnam par shes pa la khams ngun dam pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ ngamags pa'i tshul gyis

don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su khyung du// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyong ba'itsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yi jal bya ba mang par/
rnam par shes pa la khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ ngamigasapa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyare kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod nga 'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la byaba medapar/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stongang zhes bya bar yid la byed nga//
ngagags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam nga zams cang mkhyen
ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang por/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid/
kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad du// dbas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdabal
rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tham chud pa stong pa zhes byabar yid la byang de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang a med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams

shu su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba mad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yong la byang ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rango bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//

chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yodal byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos tham cur song nga nyid kyang dmigs la// stong panyid kyis kyang ma sams su byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tul

par rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong nyid kyang dmigs dogs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi la

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ng dang ldan pa'i ying labya ba medrang ra/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang

stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
rnam par shes pastong ba nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dramigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do//

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen yostongang zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ngomasams su byed de/ dnga shes rab kyi ga rol tu phyin la sdod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba tshad bar/
rnam par shes pa dran ngan ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dren dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su khyud de// drangashes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laskyong ba'i/ rnam pa thams cud mkhyen ba rkang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs

ba'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byadado// nga shes rab kyi kha sngol tu phyin paMl sbyong pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags ba'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stongapa nyid kyis
kyang rlomasamasu byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam bar shes pa mtha' las 'dras
pa stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byang ra/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das ba stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
lasprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad m khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam thar shes ba thog ma dang thamamadu ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs/
pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang mkhas pa zam gdab stong pa nyid kyar dmigs la/stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnamab thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan yi de la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs ba'i tshul gyis drer ba mad ba stong pa nyid kyang damagis/
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi sa srol tu phyin bal spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam par shes pa

rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yi dal byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom salagasubyed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyang pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyed dung ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang bar/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad

sh+tsa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa lasdod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la byaba med pa ra/ ma bar

shes nga rang gamtshan nyid stong pa zhes byabar yid la byed nge/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rangag mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha srol/
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mad par/ rnam bar shes paseramigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis mdamag

ba stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ya nga la bya ba mad par/

rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dramags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byadango// dre shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba mang par rnam pa shes pa dro ba 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang ng/ dmags pa'i

tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang pa 'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyan pa nyeng dang ldan pa'i yang l

bya ba mad par/ rnam bar shes pa dngos po med nga 'i ngo ba 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo lo 'di stong pa nyid kyang dachi gsal/ stong pa nyid kyis
dkyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyin

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang r//

dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyung ngung ldan pa'i yid 23 bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yangu la byang nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la song ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapatade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/

ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ngomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yapal bya ba mang bur mang dang gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis stong

pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom nges mas su byadad// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga 'tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid labya ba mad

paraming dang gzugs chen pe songapa zhes bya bar yang labyadang/ ngalegs pa'i tshul gyis chin pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su brang nga/ da shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dem dam pa stong ba zhes bya bar yang la byang de/ dmAgs pa'i tshul gyis demadan pa stong pa

nyingakyang dmagis la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyam pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mang dang

gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la

spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng 'i yid la bya ba mngapar/ ming dang gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byang nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang da// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par mang dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa
stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmags ba'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'ad kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlom sems su byed ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'agla/ lasod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad bar/ med dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis thogakho dang thom med ba stong nyid kyang dmigs la/song ba nyid kyas kyang rlom sems su byed do// denga shes rab kyi pha sngol tuphyin pal sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyidang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ming dang gzugs der ba tshad ba gong nga zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamigasal// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams

su khyad ngo// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ ming dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ ngamagu

pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
la bya ba mad par/ ming dang gzugs chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byadang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thums cad stong pa nyid kyang dusogs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

sams su byed de// du[-] shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasdod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan nga'i yid la bya ba med pa/ra/ ming dang gzugs rangag mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar

yang la byang nga/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprad pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cung

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ ming dang gzugs ma dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yung la bud de/ dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis mi ngalegs pa stong pa nyid kyang ngomigs la/ stong pa nying kyis

kyang rlom sems su byad nga// da[-] shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spang pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan nga'i yid 'a bya ba mdu nga ra/ mngarang gzugs dngos pa lang pa stong pa zhes bya bar

yong la bud de/ dmigs pa' tshul gyis ngas po che dpar stong pa nyang nga ngamigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi snga rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thAmA

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ mang ngang gzugs dra ba 'di stong pang zhes bya bar yang la byang nga/ dmigs nga 'i tshul gyis nga nge nyang stong pa nyad kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlomasams su byung ngo// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang lhan nga re du la bya ba madra par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i nga ro nyaso//
pa zhes bya bar yid la byed nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po meng pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byang nga
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po ngaganyis pa/// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpalas/sa dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la/

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa Thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mang par/ stsa mched druganang song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/

stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu+in pa laspyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ stsa mchod drug pha stong pa zhes bya bar yod la

byadade/ dmagags pa'i tshulagyis phyistong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa 'dzakyis kyang rnyemasams su byed de// da shes rngabakya pa rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yod la bya ba mad par/ skye mched drug phunang song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byang ngo// de shes
rab kyi pha rngal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sgyu mchad drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rtsom sams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod nga'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba med par/ skye ma chung drug chan bo stong pa zhes bya bar yang la khyadang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stabapa zheng kyis kyang tshemasams su khyadang// da shes rab kyi ba/

rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nying rang zamanga'i yid la bya ba mang par/ sku mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang ng/ dachags pa'i tshul gyis ngan ngam pa song
pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sto pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// dang shes rab kyi ba lngal duphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang ldan pa'i yadul bya ba mad par/
skya mchad drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar ya dal byed de/ dmigs nga 'tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom san sa ba byang ngo// dengashas rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i ro/ rnam pa thams rtsaakhyim pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba med par/ skya mchud drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul rgyus 'dug/

ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdang/
slaachang drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis maTha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la sbring ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tham chad pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid l//

byadad/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang thamachong pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ steng pa nying kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tsha/ rnam thams cad

mkhyen pa nyeng dang man du 'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ ny+tsamacharadrag droral ma pa so pa zhes bya bar yang l byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor pa ma dpa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma

sams su bud ngo// dra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yang la budad/ ngamigs

pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// dengashas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng 'i yid la/

bya ba mad par/ skya mchod drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid l byed da/ dmags nga 'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nying kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom samasasubyed do// deshig

sa/ rang semtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

bamang par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis [” ]mi dmigs pa stong pa nyung kyang dmagab la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/skye mched drug dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisadas

mched drug nga ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nga bo 3da stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang blomasams su byad do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tsha/ rnam ra sbams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mid par skya mchad drug dngos po med pa'i nge ba 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngob
nying song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/
rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ ceg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisanang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa/

ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid

byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stongang nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byad do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu

stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/reg pa

thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mdang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
dadu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba mang par/ reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba

med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng ba ad la bya ba mang par//

sgyu ragab rang bzhin stong ba zhes bya ba yid la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byadado// dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zhing la bya ba med par/ drag pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyisachos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmags lo/

g+haM stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems s byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod rim/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid songapa zhes byabar

yid la budang/ dmigs pa'itshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyedastong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed re// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

tsak+ki mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshulagus ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid gyis kyang rlom

sems su byed de// du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadapa ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmas//

pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ ragapa ngo bo nyidstong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang daugs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do//

dnga shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba mad par/reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmags

pa'i tshulagyis dngos po mang parob zhangastong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/stong pahrid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang ngo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rngab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang
dmigs la/ stong pa nyad kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med nga ra
tshor ba bu stong bzhes bya bar yid la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin ba la stod ba'i tshu/ rnam dra thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med nga ra/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pazhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong ba nyid
kyang dmags lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rom sems su byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshad la bya ba medapar
tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid laphyadang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// dungashas rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin la sbyong pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nying

kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// nga shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ tshor ba
wak+ki domadam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong panyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyi kyis kyang rlomasams su bud do// nganga shes rab kyi ba rel tuphani

pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang/
dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phun pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor
ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang do// de shes rab kyi pha
rogatu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das bstong pa zhes bya par yid la byadade/ ngamigs pa 'tshul gyis mtha'
las 'dus pa stong pa nyid kyang damag la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rel tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid l

bya ba medapar/ chor ba thogam dang bram mang pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham mad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su

byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
@#// tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/ stong nyid kyis kyaparlom sems su khyed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba mad nga ra/ tshor pa rang bzhanasongapa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'itshul gyis rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang dusegasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byed do// de shes

rab kyi pha rol tuphyen pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la khyadang/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis chos thams

cad stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs 'a/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasprod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cung akhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor

ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngomagras la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ma demigs pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma demags pa stongs
nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/

tshor ba dngos po med pasong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pal tshul gyis dngos ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed du// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa//

laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngang lnga pa'i yang laM bya ba mang par/ tshor ba ngobe zhing stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su bud de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ tshor ba dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis drangos po med pa'i ngo bo nyang stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung ngo// rab 'byor gzhan

yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chen po dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tsha/ rnam pa mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ grang pa nang stong pa zhes bya
badra yod labyed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba mang par/ srid pa phyi song pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha le la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cud mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byung ngo// ngenga shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dra la bya ba mad par/ srod pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed nge ngamakas pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang nga'i gas la

stong pa nyud kyis kyang rnyomasams su byed du// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamar cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ srid pa chan po stong pa zhes
bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po steng pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems u byed de// de las rab kyi rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa/nga dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ slad pa ngon dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngan ngan pa sbyong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
kyang rlom sams su byed de// da[… ] shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngang pa' mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ srang pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes
bya bar yid l byed de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga ba'i tshe//

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ngang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba mang par/ srad pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed ng/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la
stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed ngo// dung rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ srid pa mtha' las
'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byadad/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamaMgs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byung nga// denga shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad bar/ srad pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang ng/ dmags pa'i tshul

gyis thog ma dang tha ma mud pa stong pa nyid kyang dzamigs la/stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba mad par/ srad pa der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar ming la bud de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis der bsad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong ba nyidakyis kyang rlom sems su byed ng// da shes rab
kye phalol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyeng dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ phrad pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar seng 'a byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul

gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
mad par/ srad pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs rapa tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi

pha rol tu pan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ng dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sud pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byar de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gamatsha/

'ang stong pa 'ang kyang ngs gsal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom gams su byed do// dengs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yade la bya ba mang par/
sud pa mi dmigs pa sopapa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis midamags pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam sasu byeng nga// denga shes rab kyi pha rol

duphyin pa la stong pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ng 'ayong la bya ba mad par/ srangapa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos pa med pa stong pa

caT/ nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang ma sems su byedud// da shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ srid pa

bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byang/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis ngo de nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyong ba'i

tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ srad pa dngos po mang pa'i ngo bo nyingastongapa zhes bya bar yid la byang ng/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo ba
nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems drang 'asams dpa' chen ba yi'as rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i

tsho rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa 'du ngang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis

kyang rlomasams su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phye u0fb1nga nga 'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len ba phyi snang nga zhes bya bar yid la

byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang ngasogs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed de// de nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ng laspodapa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba chad drar/ len par phyin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang/
rlom gnas su byed de// ngags rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad pa ra/ len pa stong pa nyid stongar zhes bya bar

yid la byed ng/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong ba nyid kyang dusags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams

cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ len pa chen pa stong pa zhes bya ba med la khyad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po steng pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasamasau khyed

do/ dngashes drab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nga tsa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ len pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ng dmigs pa'i tshul gyisangon/

dam pa stong pa ched kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong ba'itsha/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad

bar len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stongapa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyad do// dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yud 'byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang

dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su rtsed do// degs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/len pa mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid kyang ngomigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

che rnam pa thams cangamkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yeng la bya ba mang par/ ser parngog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la khyadang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma mang pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

stong pa nyid kyis kyang rjes sems su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyan pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ len pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes

bya bar yang la khyadang/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyade kyis kyang rlomasams su khyad de/ de shes rab kyi pha rnga la tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byeng da da dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyang kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa tre ying la byung mdabar/ lan ba chos

thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ migs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ratshugs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

rgyu sprod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya'amadapar/ len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang

kha dmagis la stong nyidakyis kyang dzomasams su khyed ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/len pa mi dmigs pa

ba/ stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mdamigs pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ lan pa dras po med pastong pa zhes bya ba yid 'dang/ dmags pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

pa'i stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su khyadade// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi nga dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ len ba ngo bo nyid stong pa
zhes bya bar ming la byed du/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo khong stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi phare la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldanub 'i yid la bya ba mad par/ len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo ba 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshulargyas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidsong/
pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom

sams su khyud do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa laspyod pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yade la byed de/ dmigs

ba'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de sa rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyad dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya ba mad par M/ sridapa phunang songapa zhes bya bar yidi labyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang damigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam pa brams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ srid pa stong nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed ra/ dmigs pa'i/

tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom samasasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya ba mad par/srid kha chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yudal byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang smomasams su byung ngo// de shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidral bya ba mad par/ srid pa nganangam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yidral byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dam pa stong pa nyid kyang

dmigs la (stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyamapa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ srid pa 'as byas

stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ ngamags pa'i tshulo rgyas 'dus byas stong pa 'dakyang ngamags la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom soms su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i cho/ rnam
pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus mabyas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmags la//
[d]/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi ba rel tu phyin pa la bod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenab nyidadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/sring pa mtha' las 'das/
pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa song ba nyid kyang dmigs 'a/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang smon sems su byed de// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rbad dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par srid pa thog ma dang tha ma mang po stong pa zhes khyu bar tshad la khyad re/ mgis nga 'i tshul gyis thog ma dang rtsom

med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmagus la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ros sams su byad do// denga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ban dngag
srid pa der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// da shes rab kyi bgrol

chu phyin bal spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ sridapa drang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid/
kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams su byed do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yadi la bya ba med par M/
sred pa ches thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed d/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dramags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

khyad de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'itsho/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid ngang lenapa' ying la khu ba med par/ srade pa nga gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ me

ba'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyidastong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byang ngo// de bas sngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
ldan pa'i yang la bya ba madra par/ srid pa mngalegs pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byard/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma ngamigs pa stong pa nyid kyang ngomagras 'a/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams

su byang nga// da shes rab kyi pha rngul tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mang par/ srid pa dngos po med pas nag nga zhes bya bar yid l byed nge/ migs

pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshwa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yidel bya ba mang par/ srid pa ngob nang stong pa zhes bya bar yadi la bud de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyapa rnam sems su byed ngo// de shas

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad bar/ sred pa dngos po med pa'i nga bo nyidaso ba zhes bya ba la med byed de/ dmigs pa de tshul gyis

das po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byung ngo// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/

la spyod ba'i tsha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skya ba nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid labyar de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyidakyang dmigs la/ stong pa

gangagyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba mad par/ skya ba phyi song pa zhes bya bar yid
la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byad do// dnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medra par/ skya ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed nga/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang
rlom sems su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba mad par/ skya ba stong pa nyid stongapa zhes bya
bar yang la byang de/ ags ba'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid gyis kyang rlomasams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ngel tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe//

rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid dang ldan ng 'i yang la bya ba mang bar M/ skyo ba chen po steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngamigs pa'i tshul gyis tshan bo steng nga la nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis

la khyad de/ dmags po'i tshul gyis danadam nga stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sams sukhyad do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyan panyad dung ldan ng 'a yadi la bya ba mad par/ skyo ba 'dus byas song pa 'os bya bar yid la byung de/ dramigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmagaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
blom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad par/ skya bla 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid

pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang ngalags l/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su byed de// du shes rab kyi parol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba madra par/ sbyang ngo be nyudastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sams/
